strings.Value: "I'd like to speak with the guests some more."
"Before we begin, I'd like to talk about the envoy I'll be taking with me."
"So, how do you like our little gathering? I hope you have made some useful connections. Shall we move on to the official proceedings?"
"My apprentice, Kassil Aldori, will go with you, won't he?"
"From what I understand, you've decided to take Lander {g|House Lebeda}Lebeda{/g} with you?"
"If I'm not mistaken, you've chosen Shandra Mervey, Natala {g|House Surtova}Surtova's{/g} servant?"
"Whatever you choose, I won't argue. But you must choose your inner circle with the utmost care."
"Of course. Enjoy the feast! You deserve it."
"A fine choice. You can trust him as you would myself."
"Oh, the heir of {g|House Lebeda}House Lebeda{/g} — naive enough to think no one would recognize him here. I wouldn't trust him — who knows what he has in mind!"
"The emissary of {g|House Surtova}House Surtova{/g}? Well, perhaps it's for the best. As they say, keep your friends close, and your enemies closer..."
